etymologies: 1950s: a commercial respelling of light, light

definitions: relating to low-fat or low-sugar versions of manufactured food or drink products
shortDefinitions: denoting low-fat or low-sugar version of manufactured food or drink product

definitions: denoting a simpler or less challenging version of a particular thing or person

examples.text: the film was dismissed by many of the more serious critics as Woody Allen lite
a sort of newspaper lite—a snappy tabloid filled with shorter news pieces and extra sports and entertainment

shortDefinitions: denoting simpler or less challenging version of particular thing or person

definitions: a type of light beer with relatively few calories.
shortDefinitions: light beer with relatively few calories
